languages.text: Вышедший на вашу персональную вокс-частоту губернатор шепчет, что действующая власть Идекса — не те, за кого себя выдают. На планете произошел бунт, у власти встала еретическая секта. Губернатор умоляет немедленно нанести удар по дворцу правительства. Без верхушки новая власть не сможет удержаться у руля!

The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!
languages.original_text: Вышедший на вашу персональную вокс-частоту губернатор шепчет, что действующая власть Идекса — не те, за кого себя выдают. На планете произошел бунт, у власти встала еретическая секта. Губернатор умоляет немедленно нанести удар по дворцу правительства. Без верхушки новая власть не сможет удержаться у руля!

traits.locale_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim they are. A mutiny on the planet has brought a heretical sect into power. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike at the government palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold on to power!

The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim they are. A mutiny on the planet has brought a heretical sect into power. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike at the government palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold on to power!

With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

languages.text: Der Gouverneur, der auf deiner persönlichen Vox-Frequenz sendet, flüstert, dass die aktuelle Regierung von Idex nicht sei, wofür sie sich ausgibt. Es habe einen Aufstand auf dem Planeten gegeben und eine ketzerische Sekte habe die Macht an sich gerissen. Der Gouverneur fleht dich an, unverzüglich einen Angriff auf den Gouverneurspalast zu unternehmen. Wenn ihre Führungsebene ausgelöscht ist, kann die neue Regierung sich nicht halten!
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: Der Gouverneur, der auf deiner persönlichen Vox-Frequenz sendet, flüstert, dass die aktuelle Regierung von Idex nicht sei, wofür sie sich ausgibt. Es habe einen Aufstand auf dem Planeten gegeben und eine ketzerische Sekte habe die Macht an sich gerissen. Der Gouverneur fleht dich an, unverzüglich einen Angriff auf den Gouverneurspalast zu unternehmen. Wenn ihre Führungsebene ausgelöscht ist, kann die neue Regierung sich nicht halten!

languages.text: Sur votre fréquence-vox personnelle, le gouverneur murmure que les autorités d'Idex cachent leur véritable nature. À la suite d'un soulèvement, une secte hérétique a pris le contrôle de la planète. L'homme vous supplie d'effectuer immédiatement une frappe sur le palais gouvernemental. Ainsi privées de leurs dirigeants, les nouvelles autorités ne pourront plus conserver le pouvoir !
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: Sur votre fréquence-vox personnelle, le gouverneur murmure que les autorités d'Idex cachent leur véritable nature. À la suite d'un soulèvement, une secte hérétique a pris le contrôle de la planète. L'homme vous supplie d'effectuer immédiatement une frappe sur le palais gouvernemental. Ainsi privées de leurs dirigeants, les nouvelles autorités ne pourront plus conserver le pouvoir !

languages.text: あなたの個人ヴォックス周波数で通信している総督は、イデックスの現政権は自らが主張するような正当な存在ではないと囁いた。惑星で反乱が発生し、異端の教団が支配権を掌握した。総督はあなたに対し、政府宮殿への即時攻撃を懇願してきた。上層部を壊滅させれば、新政権は権力を維持できなくなる！
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: あなたの個人ヴォックス周波数で通信している総督は、イデックスの現政権は自らが主張するような正当な存在ではないと囁いた。惑星で反乱が発生し、異端の教団が支配権を掌握した。総督はあなたに対し、政府宮殿への即時攻撃を懇願してきた。上層部を壊滅させれば、新政権は権力を維持できなくなる！

languages.text: El gobernador, transmitiendo por tu frecuencia de voco personal, susurra que las autoridades de Idex no son quienes afirman ser. Se ha producido un levantamiento en el planeta y una secta hereje se ha hecho con el control. El gobernador te ruega que lances un ataque inmediato al palacio del gobierno. Sin sus más altos cargos, ¡las nuevas autoridades no podrán conservar el control!
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: El gobernador, transmitiendo por tu frecuencia de voco personal, susurra que las autoridades de Idex no son quienes afirman ser. Se ha producido un levantamiento en el planeta y una secta hereje se ha hecho con el control. El gobernador te ruega que lances un ataque inmediato al palacio del gobierno. Sin sus más altos cargos, ¡las nuevas autoridades no podrán conservar el control!

languages.text: 总督通过你的个人音阵频道，低声透露艾德克斯的现任当局与他们宣称的截然不同。这颗行星爆发了一场暴乱，而某支异端教派篡夺了控制权。总督请求你立刻攻击政府大殿，只要将邪教领袖消灭，傀儡政府就无法继续掌权了。
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: 总督通过你的个人音阵频道，低声透露艾德克斯的现任当局与他们宣称的截然不同。这颗行星爆发了一场暴乱，而某支异端教派篡夺了控制权。总督请求你立刻攻击政府大殿，只要将邪教领袖消灭，傀儡政府就无法继续掌权了。

languages.text: Kişisel voks frekansın üzerinden sana ulaşan vali, İdex'teki mevcut idarecilerin yalan söylediklerini fısıldıyor. Gezegende bir ayaklanma olmuş ve sapkın bir tarikat, tahtı ele geçirmiş. Vali, hükûmet sarayına derhâl saldırmanı rica ediyor. En üst kademedekiler yok edilirse başa geçenler de iktidarı ellerinde tutamaz!
languages.original_text: The governor transmitting on your personal vox-frequency whispers that Idex's current authorities are not who they claim to be. There has been an uprising on the planet, and a heretical sect has seized control. The governor pleads with you to launch an immediate strike on the governmental palace. With their top tier obliterated, the new authorities will be unable to hold onto power!

traits.locale_text: Kişisel voks frekansın üzerinden sana ulaşan vali, İdex'in yöneticilerinin yalan söylediklerini fısıldıyor. Gezegende bir ayaklanma olmuş ve sapkın bir tarikat, tahtı ele geçirmiş. Vali, hükûmet sarayına derhâl saldırmanı rica ediyor. En üst kademedekiler yok edilirse başa geçenler de iktidarı ellerinde tutamayacak!
